prompt-hotels: [{"TASK":"Curate hotel options for Commonwealth Park (venue_uid=hva-venue)","Location":"city: Culpeper city_uid=culpeper, state:VA state_uid=va.","GEO context":"lat=38.3976271, lon=-78.0055112 placeid=EjQxMzI0NiBDb21tb253ZWFsdGggUGt3eSAjMmMsIEN1bHBlcGVyLCBWQSAyMjcwMSwgVVNBIh4aHAoWChQKEgkRG7uomiG0iRFOwIzD9PxPKRICMmM.","Official venue link":"https://www.hitsshows.com/hits-venues/hits-culpeper/","Audience":"Competitive hunter/jumper riders on the A-circuit (trainers, grooms, show parents). Prioritize tight ring windows, early schooling, late features, and parking for trucks/trailers.","Tone":"Practical, insider, authoritative. Use real A-circuit phrasing (warm-up ring, jog strip, vendor row, stabling, drags, splits). No fluff.","Buckets":[{"label":"–$$$","description":"Practical/groom-friendly within ~20–25 min; easy surface lots; walkable food."},{"label":"$$$$","description":"Owner-trainer/boutique up to ~35 min; quiet, reliable service; valet/self-park clarity."}],"Must_have_amenities_any":["reliable Wi-Fi","late check-in","early coffee or breakfast","laundry access (in-house or nearby)","truck/trailer-friendly or large surface lot"],"Hard_excludes":["Motel 6","Red Roof Inn","Econo Lodge","Super 8","Rodeway Inn","weekly-rate motels","properties with persistent safety complaints"],"Safety emphasis":["well-lit parking","quiet rooms (away from nightlife)","walkable dining for grooms"],"Name_parsing":"If brand + locality (e.g., 'Hilton Garden Inn Ocala Downtown'), set hotel_name='Hilton Garden Inn', name2='Ocala Downtown'. If generic (e.g., 'Equus Inn Ocala'), set hotel_name='Equus Inn', name2='Ocala'.\",\"Chain_parsing\": \"If chain provided like 'Hilton (Hilton Garden Inn)', set chain='Hilton', chain2='Hilton Garden Inn'. Else chain='Independent', chain2='Independent'.","Amenity_normalization":"Return amenities as a semicolon-separated string OR array; prefer concise, rider-useful items (early breakfast, laundry, parking notes).","Safety_notes_style":"One sentence, concrete location/policy guidance (e.g., 'Use garage; avoid street parking with tack.').","Approx_drive_format":"Use ranges like '20–25 min'; reflect typical traffic on US-301/Largo/Bowie corridors.","Flagged budget motel chains to avoid":"Motel 6, Red Roof Inn, Econo Lodge, Super 8, Rodeway Inn.","Reference schema":"https://crt-b1434e13de34.herokuapp.com/items/agents/hub-knowledge/examples/hotel-curator_example.json","Duplicates":"Deduplicate near-identical listings; prefer the newest/most reliable page.","Minimum required JSON fields":"venue_uid, bucket, name, approx_drive, chain, amenities, safety_notes, url"}]

Use authentic insider phrasing (warm-up ring, jog strip, vendor row, stabling).","Tone":"upbeat, practical, authoritative.","Official venue link":"https://www.hitsshows.com/hits-venues/hits-culpeper/","Constraints":null,"Reference schema":"https://crt-b1434e13de34.herokuapp.com/items/agents/hub-knowledge/examples/section_profile_example.json","Minimum required JSON fields":"section_uid, section_type, section_title, section_overview, section_keywords, section_cta_text, section_img, section_img_alt, section_link, section_meta_description, section_open_graph_title, section_open_graph_description, section_search_title, section_search_description, section_spotlight"}]
data-section:
{
  "section_uid": "hva-venue-sec",
  "section_type": "section_profile",
  "section_title": "HITS Culpeper — Venue Profile (Culpeper, VA)",
  "section_overview": "Classic Virginia showgrounds feel with modern, all-weather footing and a straightforward ring layout that rewards good planning. Multiple hunter and jumper rings run at once, so build your day by in-gate rather than class order and stage one rider ahead. Warm-up rings flow best right after a drag—pop a vertical, then an oxer, and lock in your canter before traffic builds. The jog strip is announced near the hunter complex; keep numbers clearly visible and bring a quick towel/hoof oil touch-up for a polished trot-through. Vendor row covers week-save staples (gloves, hole punch, studs, spur straps) plus grab-and-go snacks between trips. Stabling is set for fast access to schooling; keep trunks tight to aisles, fans secured, and ring bags pre-packed for zero-drama turnarounds. Expect hot, humid afternoons with pop-up showers—pack extra gloves, a light quarter sheet for morning flats, and a small cooler at the stall. Parking and golf-cart routes are straightforward; obey posted aisle directions at peak times to keep the flow moving and avoid missed calls.",
  "section_keywords": [
    "HITS Culpeper",
    "Culpeper VA horse show",
    "hunter jumper",
    "equitation",
    "Grand Prix",
    "warm-up ring",
    "jog strip",
    "vendor row",
    "stabling",
    "A-circuit",
    "ring flow",
    "all-weather footing",
    "Virginia horse shows"
  ],
  "section_cta_text": "Plan your Culpeper week like a pro",
  "section_img": "https://www.hitsshows.com/hits-venues/hits-culpeper/",
  "section_img_alt": "Show rings and warm-up area at HITS Culpeper in Culpeper, Virginia",
  "section_link": "https://www.hitsshows.com/hits-venues/hits-culpeper/",
  "section_meta_description": "Insider venue profile for HITS Culpeper: warm-up strategy, jog strip tips, vendor row essentials, stabling flow, footing notes, and ring-to-ring tactics for A-circuit riders.",
  "section_open_graph_title": "HITS Culpeper — Venue Guide for A-Circuit Riders",
  "section_open_graph_description": "Authoritative notes on ring flow, jog strip, vendor row, stabling logistics, and footing—so you stay efficient all week in Culpeper.",
  "section_search_title": "HITS Culpeper Venue Profile — Culpeper, VA",
  "section_search_description": "Practical, rider-focused overview of HITS Culpeper: warm-up timing, jog strip, vendor row, stabling, footing, and show-day logistics for hunters, eq, and jumpers.",
  "section_spotlight": {
    "title": "Quick Hits for HITS Culpeper",
    "bullets": [
      "Warm-up cadence: quietest right after a drag—finish your last oxer then.",
      "Build by in-gate: group classes by ring to cut cart miles and missed calls.",
      "Jog strip kit: towel, hoof oil, alcohol spritz; numbers front and center.",
      "Footing feel: all-weather rides best once it packs—establish canter early.",
      "Hydration plan: stash ice towels and spare gloves at the stall for humid PMs.",
      "Stabling ops: fans secured, trunks flush, ring bag stocked (studs, punch, towel).",
      "Call-ups: monitor in-gate texts; stage two trips out with a spare crop and spur pair.",
      "Derby/GP days: earlier schooling wins—warm-ups surge before big cards.",
      "Vendor row timing: swing by between drags, not at last call, for stress-free fixes.",
      "Team roles: one tack runner, one ring runner; radios keep scratches off the board."
    ]
  }
}

{
  "venue_uid": "hva-venue",
  "bucket": "am",
  "params": {
    "search_mode": "breakfast_only",
    "max_distance_m": 5000,
    "price_range": "$$",
    "cuisine_allowlist_any": ["American", "Cafe", "Bakery", "Diner", "Coffee", "Brunch", "Bagels"],
    "menu_keywords_any": ["breakfast", "morning", "brunch", "bagel", "egg", "omelet", "biscuit", "grits", "hash browns", "pancakes", "waffles", "french toast", "breakfast burrito", "breakfast sandwich", "latte", "coffee", "espresso", "cold brew", "pastry", "muffin", "croissant", "yogurt parfait", "oatmeal"],
    "hours_requirements": { "opens_by_or_before": "10:30", "days": ["Mon","Tue","Wed","Thu","Fri","Sat","Sun"] },
    "hard_excludes": ["dinner only", "steakhouse", "bar", "brewery", "cocktail", "wine bar", "nightclub", "late-night only", "reservation only", "members only"],
    "sort": ["distance_m", "opens_at", "reliability_score"]
  },
  "results": [

TASK: Curate venue links for [{"venue_official_name":"Commonwealth Park","state_uid":["rec5fJbgelpY8mwh9"],"venue_official_link":"https://www.hitsshows.com/hits-venues/hits-culpeper/","city_uid":["recLQZdBxNDarIehu"],"placeId":"EjQxMzI0NiBDb21tb253ZWFsdGggUGt3eSAjMmMsIEN1bHBlcGVyLCBWQSAyMjcwMSwgVVNBIh4aHAoWChQKEgkRG7uomiG0iRFOwIzD9PxPKRICMmM","formatted_addressv3":"13246 Commonwealth Pkwy, Culpeper, VA 22701-7778","venue_recordId":"recNpPwmJ7oXdw0pC"}] (venue_uid=[{"venue_official_name":"Commonwealth Park","state_uid":["rec5fJbgelpY8mwh9"],"venue_official_link":"https://www.hitsshows.com/hits-venues/hits-culpeper/","city_uid":["recLQZdBxNDarIehu"],"placeId":"EjQxMzI0NiBDb21tb253ZWFsdGggUGt3eSAjMmMsIEN1bHBlcGVyLCBWQSAyMjcwMSwgVVNBIh4aHAoWChQKEgkRG7uomiG0iRFOwIzD9PxPKRICMmM","formatted_addressv3":"13246 Commonwealth Pkwy, Culpeper, VA 22701-7778","venue_recordId":"recNpPwmJ7oXdw0pC"}]), Commonwealth Park represents an Equestrian Venue located near , Location: 13246 Commonwealth Pkwy, Culpeper, VA 22701-7778, GEO context: lat=38.3976271, lon=-78.0055112 placeid=EjQxMzI0NiBDb21tb253ZWFsdGggUGt3eSAjMmMsIEN1bHBlcGVyLCBWQSAyMjcwMSwgVVNBIh4aHAoWChQKEgkRG7uomiG0iRFOwIzD9PxPKRICMmM., ### Venue Link Field Definitions - venue_official_link → Canonical homepage for the venue. - venue_link_stay → On-site or affiliated lodging (hotels, resorts, rentals). - venue_link_dine → Venue-hosted or recommended dining/restaurants. - venue_link_locale → “Things to do” / local attractions content. - venue_link_events → Events schedule page (official calendar of shows). - venue_link_rvparks → Dedicated RV or campground info. - venue_link_vendors → Vendor Row / exhibitor marketplace. - venue_link_essentials → Practical services: groceries, pharmacy, tack. - venue_link_riders → Rider services: entries, scratches, registration info. - venue_link_barn → Barn & stabling: stalls, hay, bedding, feed services. - venue_link_services → On-site professional services: braiding, vet, farrier. - venue_link_results → Competition results, standings, order of go. - venue_link_carts → Golf cart rentals or mobility vehicles. - venue_link_cars → Car rental or transportation services., Goal: For each populated link, extract canonical content and return JSON.
Reference schema: https://crt-b1434e13de34.herokuapp.com/items/agents/hub-knowledge/examples/venue-link-curator_example_v2.json, Minimum required JSON fields per link:
venue_uid, category, field, url, canonical_title, meta_description, keywords, notes
